title: New: Prom – Motion Picture Soundtrack (Radiohead Cover)
content:
Ah, the age old question that philosophers have pondered for years – “How do you cover Radiohead without it sounding completely and utterly shit?”.

Well, I can’t give you the exact formula, but Toronto duo Prom absolutely nail Motion Picture Soundtrack, dropping the atmospheric ethereal vibe and adopting a grittier, less refined position, matching that of their debut track titled Annie. Inspired by “cheap sex/sad films” or is that cheap films and sad sex? Either way, check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
